about_the_game:
These luxury family condos found in the Parkland District feature comfortable interiors with modern features while still having room for family. Feel like relaxing, the birds and city chatter ambiance with or without the background classical music playlist.

This episode also includes a hidden objects game "Find the presents" where presents can be found throughout the living quarters.

This episode is part of Ambient Channels Collector's Pass 2020-2021

name: Ambient Channels: Downtown - Parkland Condos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5-5200U
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti or AMD R7 290
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700
  • Graphics: AMD R9 380 or Nvidia GTX 1080
